definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: We are noodle folk. Broth runs through our veins.
sentences.chinese: 我們是做麪條的，血脈裏流淌着湯汁。

sentences.english: Such fish-meat tastes refreshing and delicate with extraordinarily delicious juice.
sentences.chinese: 松鼠魚的魚肉爽滑細膩，湯汁鮮美異常。

sentences.english: Uncover and boil until any liquid remaining in skillet evaporates.
sentences.chinese: 揭蓋煮至將所有煮鍋中的湯汁收幹。

sentences.english: The soup in this bowl of noodles is made of bree. It tastes thick and delicious.
sentences.chinese: 這碗麪的湯汁是用老湯調製的，味道鮮美醇厚。

sentences.english: Transfer the artichokes to a plate, drizzle them with pan juices, and serve.
sentences.chinese: 將朝鮮薊裝入盤子裏，澆上鍋裏的湯汁，上桌。

sentences.english: Finally the bean curd with buttered blade into thick slices into soup, can.
sentences.chinese: 最後把豆腐用抹黃油的刀片成厚片，倒入湯汁即可。

sentences.english: Return meat to pan; toss to coat.
sentences.chinese: 將肉放回鍋中，使肉的表面沾滿湯汁。

sentences.english: Strain through fine-mesh sieve back into pot with liquid.
sentences.chinese: 用細眼濾網將混合湯汁二次過濾後倒回罐中。

sentences.english: Abrupt, food of capture of table of pop-up of a cat, do so that soup juice ins disorder.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，一隻貓跳上桌子抓取食物，弄得湯汁狼藉。

sentences.english: Strain through fine-mesh sieve into large clean pot, reserving solids.
sentences.chinese: 用細眼濾網將湯汁過濾，保留濾出的固體部分。

sentences.english: Season with salt and strain the broth. This is now your prawn stock.
sentences.chinese: 用鹽調味，湯汁過濾後便成蝦湯。

sentences.english: Add the clams to the pan, together with their strained cooking liquid.
sentences.chinese: 將蜆放入鍋，加入煮蜆時留下的湯汁再煮。

sentences.english: Steamed chicken broth to use in order to maintain fresh thick soup.
sentences.chinese: 要用雞湯蒸制，以保持湯汁濃鮮。

sentences.english: Add sauces and gravies to meats, and cut meats into small pieces to make them easy to swallow.
sentences.chinese: 往肉里加上湯汁調料，把肉切成小塊，以方便呑咽。

sentences.english: Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Reduce heat.
sentences.chinese: 燒開，邊煮邊攪拌2分鐘或湯汁變濃稠，關小火。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
